name: Electra-Board
description:
IMPORTANT: For the GMTK Game Jam with the theme of "Only One", I chose to make a game with only one input. 

In Electra-Board you are a surge of electricity running through a circuit board. To turn you may only press the space bar, or if on mobile then tap. The surge of energy will rotate clockwise, you must find the pathway for the current. The surge will constantly move in any given instruction but it MUST move. Can you solve the puzzles? Give it a try! Good Luck!
